Articles.Content: I can't donate because my parents won't let me but at the very least I've put this in my sig.

Thanks guys.

For similar reasons, as Yukon, I can't donate but I finally got the sig.

Of the people streaming tomorrow (for the First Bona-Fide Official Project: Phoenix Stream), I'll be one of them.

Get ready for

Bagel Rabbit/Upsilon's

Protessional Lifstrem!*

(*not very protessional actually)

On my stream, there will be:

  • Excitement! Kerbal Space Program is a fun game to play.
  • Explosions! And lots of them.
  • Neat Craft! There's several I haven't shown you yet.
  • Physics Abuse! Because that's what I do best.
  • Music! Because nothing else beats live music and KSP.
  • Audience suggestions! Because you guys are awesome and probably have better ideas than I do.
  • ...and much more! I've planned some surprises, though I can't remember what they are right now.

To misquote Felsmak, "You know you need it. You know you crave it."

Time:

Saturday, 9/5 at 12pm-1:30pm EST

For goodness' sake, watch this stream! It will be like my YouTube channel, only much more so. And of course, it will support an absolutely fantastic cause.

Go to my Twitch channel HERE! Or better yet, go to the official Project: Phoenix Twitch channel. There'll be plenty of other great streamers tomorrow, too, so you might want to check them out as well

I hope this announcement builds at least small quantities of HypeTM. Mark your calendars!

Oh, and thank you guys so much for the donations so far! Keep them coming, ladies and gents. SkyRender really appreciates your support.

-Upsilon

I'll be there, giving you bad advice on how to build things.

I should probably take the time to announce that I will be doing the second Project Phoenix livestream today! My channel is http://www.twitch.tv/noname117spore, or you can just go to the official Project Phoenix channel which has already been listed above. I'm still trying to decide whether I'm going to try something ambitious and insane in KSP or play some From The Depths instead.

Smexy Pontoons

Never Forget.

Avera9eJoe is starting our last livestream of the night! Visit the livestream here: http://www.twitch.tv/avera9ejoe

The stream was amazing! Thanks everyone for stopping by and chatting. We got a lot done in my cinematic planning and I hope to have even more people next week! I maybe planning out some of the actual script...

I regret that I wasn't able to watch any of it; my family has been convening pretty much the entire week, and yesterday was the big day for taking action on the "dad" problem (as well as deciding where my mother and I will be going from here). Hopefully I can catch the next streaming sessions, though!

Take all the time that you need SkyRender!

Oh, sorry for your loss SkyRender, hope your house gets fixed soon.

But what if the campaign fails to reach its target budget in 6 days?

Oh, sorry for your loss SkyRender, hope your house gets fixed soon.

But what if the campaign fails to reach its target budget in 6 days?

It doesn't have an end date.

Oh, sorry for your loss SkyRender, hope your house gets fixed soon.

But what if the campaign fails to reach its target budget in 6 days?

Six days? We were planning eight weeks.

As Endersmens said, though, there's not set end date.
